bug.author: Vovochka777
bug.description:

markerType and color in wrong order.

comments.comment: I have started working on this. Will keep you updated on the progress. Thanks.
Done here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/commit/232f564011cad27fbde05fd713a04a6b38945bfd>232f564</denchmark-link> . Please have a look and let me know if this is fine.
it seems good. you should open a pull request.
I have opened the Pull Request and it has passed required builds. Please merge it.
